title: TVS Motor sales rise 15% in August
description: TVS Motor saw a 15 per cent rise in its sales by selling 3,33,787 units in August, the company said in a stock exchange filing on Thursday. It had registered sales of 2,90,694 units in the same month of last year. Domestic two-wheeler sales grew by 33 per cent to 2,39,325 units in August 2022 from 1,79,999 units in August 2021.
